div.p: A38 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
To proof.
MS letter head: what is it? For approach letter see M to E. Strickland, 12 November 1887. Sydney

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I was glad to receive your kind letter of the 12th and I do assure you that it is with [...] and deep regret that I write in reply to explain to you the utter impossibility of my accepting your invitation so warmly given to join you all in giving welcome to Cuthbertson
William Robert Cuthbertson. — I do hope you may have a good gathering and that it may prove full of instruction and valuable information —
I must be content with reading hereafter all about it, and with your very admirable and zealous Secretary I feel confident that all will be carefully and accurately reported —
I knew not what to tell you of [...] here — I fear we are a doomed lot. And now my dear Baron wishing all success to you and to the Society pray believe me to be always

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
